overview:
A privately-owned, family run business, Moneytree is headquartered in the Seattle area and is a national and regional leader in the financial services industry. Moneytree has earned its industry leadership position by working toward its mission of exceeding customersâ€™ expectations, creating a professional work environment and making a positive impact on the communities in which we live and work. Moneytree was named the winner of Seattle Business Magazine’s Best Companies to Work For Contest

Moneytree is the premier provider of check cashing and payday loan services in the five western states in which it operates. In addition to these core services, Moneytree offers prepaid debit and gift cards, money orders, wire fund transfers through Western Union,Â® and bill pay services. A leader in philanthropic giving, Moneytree supports many organizations that benefit youth, families and financial literacy.

Moneytree has been recognized by Seattle Business Magazine (formerly Washington CEO Magazine) as one of the â€œBest Companies to Work Forâ€ in Washington eight of the last nine years. In 2008, 2009 and 2010, Moneytree was named the best Large Company to Work For in Washington. At the 2010 awards event, Moneytree was inducted into the Best Companies to Work For Hall of Fame.

Today, Moneytree employs more than 900 team members in more than 130 branches throughout British Columbia, California, Colorado, Idaho, Nevada and Washington.
